name: AuraHomeMonitoring
0:
”Alexa, open Aura”
”Alexa, ask Aura for today's home overview”
”Alexa, ask Aura when the latest motion occurred”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aura
des:
Aura Home Monitoring - now works with Alexa! Alexa makes it easier than ever to find out what's going on at home.

To get started, simply link your account and say “Start Aura” or any other supported phrase and the Aura Home Monitoring Skill will be ready to go.

Try saying “Alexa, ask Aura…”
- to switch to Home Scene
- to show me recent activity
- who's home?
- when motion started this morning

Note: In order to use Amazon Alexa with your Aura system, you will need an Aura account and an Aura Starter Kit.
